website_summaries.verdict: Any young Shopkins fan will appreciate this set's grocery shopping theme, and parents  like the reasonable price.
pros: Adorable mini set with numerous Shopkins
Provides lots of creative fun for youngsters as they take their Shoppie dolls on trips to the grocery store
cons: Some of the pieces are quite small, and a few are made of flimsy cardboard

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 and loves shopkins and was very excited to open this on Christmas. I love how they come in the little packages like real food. They are tiny and easily lost and can be a choking hazard for younger kids. The display and checkout counter are nice and she pretends her Barbie is shopping with the little shopping cart. Such a cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good for shopkin fans
customer_reviews.text: Fun set for a shopkin collector. It doesn't come with a shoppie doll, but it's fun for a child that already has a few dolls. A good gift for just under $20.
customer_reviews.author: october_mommy

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this set sturdy and fun for girls who love shopkins
customer_reviews.author: stinkbug

customer_reviews.title: Over priced for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved this set. I feel that it is overpriced for such little pieces, but this is what children want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Typical Shopkins: superior price
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around in brick and mortar stores and online. This was the best price/value. Shipping was quick. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Moto

customer_reviews.title: A little small, but awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves all the extra pieces you can buy for this! It’s a tad small considering all the “food” you can get to stock the shelves but it’s pretty neat just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves Shopkins & this was a great addition to her collection
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Only comes with 2 shopkins
customer_reviews.text: Really cute My four year old daughter loves it and she plays with it everyday I wish it came with more than 2 shopkins
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: She loved it !!! It was sooo much fun to open. Opening all the little pieces took so long and it was great because just that was entertaining. Super cute shopkins set
customer_reviews.author: Julita

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it...
customer_reviews.text: It only has two Shopkins then the accessories you see Kim the picture. I thought they came with a few more then that. So that was a bummer. But my daughters loved it and that's what matters
customer_reviews.author: Julie Nasca

customer_reviews.title: Shopkins
customer_reviews.text: If it is a shopkins my daughter loves it this is a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Beardsley

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my niece. She's currently in to Shopkins and she loved this!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Ward

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor selected the product and she wanted it for her birthday. It was an excellent product and an excellent experience.
customer_reviews.author: Asim

customer_reviews.title: cheap and break easy
customer_reviews.text: cheap quality, to many small pieces gets boring, has a weird smell

customer_reviews.title: I love this product 😁😀
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute it comes with a lot of parts it’s amazing
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps little ones busy
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price I got a discount. My 3 year old enjoys playing with this set and only down side to is having to buy so many of them to fill the shelf of this particular set.
customer_reviews.author: Nissa j Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Pick N' Pack Small Mart was a perfect addition to my daughter's Shopkins Collection
customer_reviews.text: Pick N' Pack Small Mart was a perfect addition to my daughter's Shopkins Collection. This item met my expectations. She loves playing with it.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE SPK
customer_reviews.text: Love this SPK small mart its super cute and my 4 year old loves playing with it

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 9year old niece and she absolutely loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to find toy
customer_reviews.text: I know my grandchild will enjoy this toy. Fast, easy transaction!

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. Even I had fun playing with it.

customer_reviews.title: Not a durable toy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! Well made. A must toy for Shopkimd fans.

product_meta.title: Shopkins Small Mart Playset Childrens Toy
product_meta.description:
Shopkins Mini Pack brings the world of grocery stores into miniature scale! Collect familiar market items like milk cartons, ice cream tubs, detergent bottles, cookie bags, pancake mix boxes and more … each with a mystery Shopkin hidden inside.

Bring your Mini Pack collection to life with the Pick n' Pack Small Mart, where you can merchandise, check out, and re-stock your very own miniature grocery store.

Compatible with Shoppie Dolls, sold separtately



SET CONTAINS:
1 x Small Mart Playset
feature_bullets: Miniature, real-life inspired packaging with a mystery Shopkin inside!
The Pick n' Pack Small Mart Playset is the prefect place to play with your Shopkins Mini Packs Collection
Scaled to Shoppie Dolls and Shopkins figures
Includes a check-out counter, a shelf storage, a bagging station, a shoppign cart, and a spinning shopping bag carousel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars263 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
